021import dev.dejvokep.boostedyaml.YamlDocument;
022import dev.dejvokep.boostedyaml.block.implementation.Section;
023import net.tnemc.core.TNECore;
024import net.tnemc.core.account.holdings.HoldingsEntry;
025import net.tnemc.core.account.holdings.modify.HoldingsModifier;
026import net.tnemc.core.account.holdings.modify.HoldingsOperation;
027import net.tnemc.core.actions.ActionSource;
028import net.tnemc.core.manager.TransactionManager;
029import net.tnemc.core.transaction.Receipt;
030import net.tnemc.core.transaction.TransactionParticipant;
031import net.tnemc.core.utils.Identifier;
032import net.tnemc.plugincore.PluginCore;
033import net.tnemc.plugincore.core.io.storage.Datable;
034import net.tnemc.plugincore.core.io.storage.StorageConnector;
035import net.tnemc.plugincore.core.utils.IOUtil;
036import org.jetbrains.annotations.NotNull;
037import org.jetbrains.annotations.Nullable;
038
039import java.io.File;
040import java.io.FileInputStream;
041import java.io.IOException;
042import java.math.BigDecimal;
043import java.util.ArrayList;
044import java.util.Collection;
045import java.util.List;
046import java.util.Locale;
047import java.util.Optional;
048import java.util.UUID;
049
050/**
051 * YAMLLog
052 *
053 * @author creatorfromhell
054 * @since 0.1.2.0
055 */
056public class YAMLReceipt implements Datable<Receipt> {
057
058  /**
059   * The class that is represented by the O parameter.
060   *
061   * @return The class that represents the parameter.
062   */
063  @Override
064  public Class<? extends Receipt> clazz() {
065
066    return Receipt.class;
067  }
068
069  /**
070   * USed to purge the objects of this datable.
071   *
072   * @param connector The storage connector to use for this transaction.
073   */
074  @Override
075  public void purge(final StorageConnector<?> connector) {
076
077  }
078
079  /**
080   * Used to store this object.
081   *
082   * @param connector  The storage connector to use for this transaction.
083   * @param receipt    The object to be stored.
084   * @param identifier An optional identifier for loading this object. Note: some Datables may
085   *                   require this identifier.
086   */
087  @Override
088  public void store(final StorageConnector<?> connector, @NotNull final Receipt receipt, @Nullable final String identifier) {
089
090
091    final String fileSrc = "transactions/" + receipt.getId().toString() + ".yml";
092    TNECore.yaml().add(fileSrc);
093
094    final File file = new File(PluginCore.directory(), "transactions/" + receipt.getId().toString() + ".yml");
095    if(!file.exists()) {
096      try {
097        if(!file.createNewFile()) {
098          PluginCore.log().error("Issue creating transaction file. Transaction: " + receipt.getId().toString());
099          return;
100        }
101      } catch(final IOException ignore) {
102
103        PluginCore.log().error("Issue creating transaction file. Transaction: " + receipt.getId().toString());
104        return;
105      }
106    }
107
108    YamlDocument yaml = null;
109    try {
110      yaml = YamlDocument.create(file);
111    } catch(final IOException ignore) {
112
113      PluginCore.log().error("Issue loading transaction file. Transaction: " + receipt.getId().toString());
114      return;
115    }
116
117    yaml.set("id", receipt.getId().toString());
118    yaml.set("time", receipt.getTime());
119    yaml.set("type", receipt.getType());
120    yaml.set("source.type", receipt.getSource().type());
121    yaml.set("source.name", receipt.getSource().name());
122    yaml.set("archive", receipt.isArchive());
123    yaml.set("voided", receipt.isVoided());
124
125    if(receipt.getFrom() != null && receipt.getModifierFrom() != null) {
126      yaml.set("from.id", receipt.getFrom().getId().toString());
127      yaml.set("from.tax", receipt.getFrom().getTax().toPlainString());
128
129      for(final HoldingsEntry entry : receipt.getFrom().getStartingBalances()) {
130        yaml.set("from.starting." + entry.getRegion() + "." + entry.getCurrency().toString() + "." + entry.getHandler().asID(), entry.getAmount().toPlainString());
131      }
132
133      for(final HoldingsEntry entry : receipt.getFrom().getEndingBalances()) {
134        yaml.set("from.ending." + entry.getRegion() + "." + entry.getCurrency().toString() + "." + entry.getHandler().asID(), entry.getAmount().toPlainString());
135      }
136
137      yaml.set("from.modifier.region", receipt.getModifierFrom().getRegion());
138      yaml.set("from.modifier.currency", receipt.getModifierFrom().getCurrency().toString());
139      yaml.set("from.modifier.modifier", receipt.getModifierFrom().getModifier().toPlainString());
140      yaml.set("from.modifier.operation", receipt.getModifierFrom().getOperation().name());
141    }
142
143    if(receipt.getTo() != null && receipt.getModifierTo() != null) {
144
145      yaml.set("to.id", receipt.getTo().getId().toString());
146      yaml.set("to.tax", receipt.getTo().getTax().toPlainString());
147
148      for(final HoldingsEntry entry : receipt.getTo().getStartingBalances()) {
149        yaml.set("to.starting." + entry.getRegion() + "." + entry.getCurrency().toString() + "." + entry.getHandler().asID(), entry.getAmount().toPlainString());
150      }
151
152      for(final HoldingsEntry entry : receipt.getTo().getEndingBalances()) {
153        yaml.set("to.ending." + entry.getRegion() + "." + entry.getCurrency().toString() + "." + entry.getHandler().asID(), entry.getAmount().toPlainString());
154      }
155
156      yaml.set("to.modifier.region", receipt.getModifierTo().getRegion());
157      yaml.set("to.modifier.currency", receipt.getModifierTo().getCurrency().toString());
158      yaml.set("to.modifier.modifier", receipt.getModifierTo().getModifier().toPlainString());
159      yaml.set("to.modifier.operation", receipt.getModifierTo().getOperation().name());
160    }
161
162    try {
163      yaml.save();
164
165      yaml = null;
166    } catch(final IOException ignore) {
167      PluginCore.log().error("Issue saving transaction file. Transaction: " + receipt.getId().toString());
168      return;
169    }
170    TNECore.yaml().remove(fileSrc);
171  }
172
173  /**
174   * Used to store all objects of this type.
175   *
176   * @param connector  The storage connector to use for this transaction.
177   * @param identifier The identifier used to load objects, if they relate to a specific identifier,
178   *                   otherwise this will be null.
179   */
180  @Override
181  public void storeAll(final StorageConnector<?> connector, @Nullable final String identifier) {
182
183    for(final Receipt receipt : TransactionManager.receipts().getReceipts().values()) {
184      store(connector, receipt, identifier);
185    }
186  }
187
188  /**
189   * Used to load this object.
190   *
191   * @param connector  The storage connector to use for this transaction.
192   * @param identifier The identifier used to identify the object to load.
193   *
194   * @return The object to load.
195   */
196  @Override
197  public Optional<Receipt> load(final StorageConnector<?> connector, @NotNull final String identifier) {
198
199    final File file = new File(PluginCore.directory(), "transactions/" + identifier + ".yml");
200    if(!file.exists()) {
201
202      PluginCore.log().error("Null receipt file passed to YAMLReceipt.load. Receipt: " + identifier);
203      return Optional.empty();
204    }
205    return load(file, identifier);
206  }
207
208  public Optional<Receipt> load(final File file, final String identifier) {
209
210    if(file == null) {
211
212      PluginCore.log().error("Null account file passed to YAMLReceipt.load. Receipt: " + identifier);
213      return Optional.empty();
214    }
215
216    try {
217
218      try(final FileInputStream fis = new FileInputStream(file)) {
219
220        final YamlDocument yaml = YamlDocument.create(fis);
221
222        if(yaml != null && yaml.contains("id")) {
223
224          final UUID id = UUID.fromString(yaml.getString("id"));
225          final long time = yaml.getLong("time");
226          final String type = yaml.getString("type");
227          final String sourceType = yaml.getString("source.type");
228          final String sourceName = yaml.getString("source.name");
229
230          final Receipt receipt = new Receipt(id, time, type);
231          receipt.setSource(ActionSource.create(sourceName, sourceType));
232
233          loadParticipant(yaml, receipt, "from");
234          loadParticipant(yaml, receipt, "to");
235
236          receipt.setArchive(yaml.getBoolean("archive"));
237          receipt.setVoided(yaml.getBoolean("voided"));
238
239          return Optional.of(receipt);
240        } else {
241
242          PluginCore.log().warning("Invalid receipt file passed to YAMLReceipt.load. Skipping. Receipt: " + identifier);
243        }
244      }
245
246    } catch(final IOException ignore) {
247
248      PluginCore.log().error("Issue loading account file. Receipt: " + identifier);
249
250      return Optional.empty();
251    }
252    return Optional.empty();
253  }
254
255  public void loadParticipant(final YamlDocument yaml, final Receipt receipt, final String type) {
256
257    if(!yaml.contains(type + ".id")) {
258      return;
259    }
260
261    final TransactionParticipant participant = new TransactionParticipant(UUID.fromString(yaml.getString(type + ".id")), new ArrayList<>());
262
263    if(yaml.contains(type + ".tax")) {
264      participant.setTax(new BigDecimal(yaml.getString(type + ".tax")));
265    }
266
267    participant.getStartingBalances().addAll(loadHoldings(yaml, type, "starting"));
268    participant.getEndingBalances().addAll(loadHoldings(yaml, type, "ending"));
269
270    if(type.toLowerCase(Locale.ROOT).equals("from")) {
271      receipt.setFrom(participant);
272      receipt.setModifierFrom(loadModifier(yaml, type));
273    } else {
274      receipt.setTo(participant);
275      receipt.setModifierTo(loadModifier(yaml, type));
276    }
277  }
278
279  public HoldingsModifier loadModifier(final YamlDocument yaml, final String type) {
280
281    return new HoldingsModifier(yaml.getString(type + ".modifier.region"),
282                                UUID.fromString(yaml.getString(type + ".modifier.currency")),
283                                new BigDecimal(yaml.getString(type + ".modifier.modifier")),
284                                HoldingsOperation.valueOf(yaml.getString(type + ".modifier.operation")));
285
286  }
287
288  public List<HoldingsEntry> loadHoldings(final YamlDocument yaml, final String type, final String holdingsType) {
289
290    final List<HoldingsEntry> holdings = new ArrayList<>();
291
292
293    final Section startingSection = yaml.getSection(type + "." + holdingsType);
294    if(startingSection != null) {
295
296      for(final Object regionObj : startingSection.getKeys()) {
297
298
299        final String region = (String)regionObj;
300        final Section currencySection = startingSection.getSection(region);
301        if(currencySection != null) {
302
303          for(final Object currencyObj : currencySection.getKeys()) {
304
305            final String currency = (String)currencyObj;
306            final Section handlerSection = currencySection.getSection(currency);
307            if(handlerSection != null) {
308
309              for(final Object handlerObj : handlerSection.getKeys()) {
310
311                final String handler = (String)handlerObj;
312                final BigDecimal amount = new BigDecimal(handlerSection.getString(handler));
313                final HoldingsEntry entry = new HoldingsEntry(region, UUID.fromString(currency), amount, Identifier.fromID(handler));
314                holdings.add(entry);
315              }
316            }
317          }
318        }
319      }
320    }
321    return holdings;
322  }
323
324  /**
325   * Used to load all objects of this type.
326   *
327   * @param connector  The storage connector to use for this transaction.
328   * @param identifier The identifier used to load objects, if they relate to a specific identifier,
329   *                   otherwise this will be null.
330   *
331   * @return A collection containing the objects loaded.
332   */
333  @Override
334  public Collection<Receipt> loadAll(final StorageConnector<?> connector, @Nullable final String identifier) {
335
336    final Collection<Receipt> receipts = new ArrayList<>();
337
338    for(final File file : IOUtil.getYAMLs(new File(PluginCore.directory(), "transactions"))) {
339
340      final Optional<Receipt> loaded = load(file, file.getName().replace(".yml", ""));
341      if(loaded.isPresent()) {
342        receipts.add(loaded.get());
343        TransactionManager.receipts().log(loaded.get());
344      }
345    }
346    return receipts;
347  }
348}
